channel.title: Vacation Galore on Andy Dyer
channel.description: Recent content in Vacation Galore on Andy Dyer

item.title: Things To Do While I'm on Vacation in December
item.description: I didn't take much of my vacation time this year, so I'm left with thirteen days of vacation to take in December. In an effort to make the most of this bounty of time off, I made a list of things to do. Thanks to Jamie for suggesting I make a list after patiently enduring my first couple brainstorming sessions. Here's the list in no particular order: Triumphant return to homebrewing - Brew an American Pale Ale.
